item.title: NEM
item.description: score:74 Chances: Gold recently jumped to record highs and the precious metal is on track to see its best annual performance since 2020. Falling real yields and a weaker dollar are macro tailwinds for gold and gold mining companies. Investors are looking for safe haven assets like gold amidst economic uncertainties.
